5iOAf9hnpsDD6mDknuvuYQ.text: Zenaida's Cafe proves the old adage you can't judge a book by its cover. Chef Sterling delivers five star food and service where you don't expect it. We wandered in only because we happened to be in the area and noticed its good reviews on Yelp. My advice, go when you can. You won't regret it.

1cD_BDyF25W2FjrM0BP2rg.text: This is an eclectic little cafe that is best described as a fine dine comfort food. The chef as worked at some of the great restaurants on the strip and it shows. But his caring and concern for his customers come across in every bite of food. Most especially in the little desserts that are passed out at the end of your meal. As great as what I ordered tasted, this was heaven. Prepared by the chef's wife, this is shows that this is clearly a family run business. All hands on deck.  I suggest everyone in the area give them a try, because this hidden gem deserves our support.

HuZ0QIXh0Oc69GMtecdOwA.text: This review is long long long overdue. Me and my girlfriend first came here about 3-4 months ago for breakfast. It was amazing. Eggs Benedict and the cinnamon roll are absolutely perfect. The chef even gave us chips with a garlic aioli on the house to start off and they were delicious. And at the end of our meal he sent out another plate for us which was the highlight of the whole dining experience. We came back today and it was dejavu. Great food, and at the end of the meal the chef sent us some kind of banana bread with a really warm sauce, and ohmylawd. He even came out and said hi and thanked us for coming in! Something special! I'd recommend this place to anyone looking for some good breakfast! I'd give it more than 5 stars if I could.

1yc8LjY7Xa1BxsgIyhvfuA.text: Had a great first meal here yesterday. Pancakes and the best bacon ever. The chef sent over homemade chips and also a desert that was the perfect ending to a great meal. My friend had chicken and waffles, which I tried. Perfect ratios and flavor.   Ambiance and service was top notch, even have a dog friendly patio.   You won't be disappointed. yOY3tX26glyfO5Et2gptIg.text: We stopped in on our last day of our little Vegas getaway. Located in an unassuming little strip mall, I would have easily overlooked this place had it not been for Yelp. I can't even begin to write about how good this place is! Everything was fantastic, the coffee, the eggs Benedict, the fantastic homemade chips with their addictive sauce. And the bacon. Thick cut and perfectly cooked. Even my super critical husband couldn't find a bad thing to say. The service was friendly and kind. After our meal, while we were in a daze of happiness, our server dropped off a plate of cookies.   I usually mock the reviewers in my head when they write that they don't want to share how good a place is because it'll get too popular and they won't be able to get a table so easy anymore.  But here I am, hesitating to submit this little review.  Zenaida's is so good!  Go there as soon as it's daylight out and pat your belly from sweet sweet satisfaction afterwards.

NaWf7w6kEp9yuzSCLP8QiQ.text: Zenaida's is totally a hidden gem for breakfast. The first time I came here I was maybe a little bit hung over, so that probably made the food that much better. I had the pancakes. I am not often impressed by pancakes, but these were memorable.   During my most recent visit, I had the biscuits and gravy. Amazing. The biscuits were fluffy and addicting. They were covered with a creamy, meaty sauce. I could barely eat half because it was so filling.   The ambiance here is charming. A little confusing, but charming. Multi-colored tiled floors and local art hanging on the walls makes me think of a club house I had in middle school. The music seemed to play one jazz song for my entire visit (in a charming way).   The staff have always been super sweet. A very attentive server always checked up on me. And the chef made the rounds and said 'Hi' to everyone in the restaurant.   The food and service were amazing. The ambiance is interesting. Overall, I will definitely be heading back.

Nm5GYMEbcnwGkrR7_QGxgA.text: CALL ALL FOODIES!! I just found the Best kept secret in Las Vegas!  This cafe had the most delicious food. Honestly the best clam chowder ever. The most extraordinary avocado toast. Have you ever had fried chicken with Carmel syrup and powered sugar, neither had I, Omg.  It was heavenly. The hamburgers were juicy and cooked to perfection. The garlic fries were in a class all their own. Last but not least, by any means, the most divine chocolate chip cookies, with a secret ingredient. G2_CaCDvLLv3kUQrqIzMdQ.text: We love coming to Zenaida's cafe! All of the servers are always so nice. The chef is amazing, warm, and welcoming! They also always give special attention to our little one, making us feel comfortable to dine with a rambunctious little toddler. kNmWHZVgptbQrBs3kJKjag.text: I am thrilled with my new find, Zenaida's Cafe on Pecos at Tropicana. As you can see from the photos on their website, the atmosphere is casual, cozy, and very relaxed.  Smooth jazz is a welcome change from the sometimes loud, intrusive music of more fast-paced restaurants. Jamie said the most popular vegan dish is the tofu scramble with an Asian slaw. Everything is fresh, light, and savory. There are several other plant-based options on the menu, which makes this the ideal place for me, as well as my friends. Chef Sterling has been raised on a plant-based diet and knows how to create delicious and truly healthy dishes. Locals and visitors alike will be pleased to add Zenaida's to their favorite restaurant list.

mfDIsK9qKNwqkSyQfVx_sQ.text: You know when you're afraid to try new places because it may not be as good as you thought it would be? Zenaida's is the complete opposite. It's the kind of place that makes you want to kick yourself for not going there sooner.   The location and signage makes it a little hard to see and find. I first saw it when we went to Taco y Taco. We decided to stop by today for breakfast and the restaurant was decently busy. Jazz music was playing in the background. We ordered the avocado toast to start, my boyfriend had the biscuits and gravy and I had the tofu scrambled. Along with our avocado toast the waitress brought out a basket of chips with aioli. The chips seemed homemade, they were thin, salty, and as long as a full potato.   This was my first experience having avocado toast and it was unreal. The garlic of the toast blended perfectly with the creamy avocado and the tomatoes were juicy. It was a perfect starter and I officially know what the hype is with avocado toast.    Now my boyfriend gets biscuits and gravy pretty much everywhere that offers it. This biscuits and gravy blew his mind. He is convinced it's the best he's ever had. The gravy wasn't white and coagulated, it was full of sausage chunks. The biscuits were dense and split in two so there was a great balance of gravy to biscuits. To top it off they add hot links! This reminds me of how every breakfast in Alaska comes with reindeer sausage. I could have just eaten the hot links as a breakfast.   By the time I got to my tofu scramble I was pretty full already. The scramble was presented on a long plate in a log formation, similar to how fried rice is served. It was full of huge chunks of broccoli, cauliflower, rice, and mushrooms. If you don't really like tofu, go ahead and get this scramble because it's very well hidden and it's basically like a breakfast vegetable fried rice. My favorite part was the furikake and nori tucked inside.   The meal ended with a warm chocolate chip cookie for both of us. My boyfriend was seriously smiling the entire time we were there. We can't wait to come back and try everything from the zucchini fries to the monte cristo to the chicken wings. Best hidden gem in the neighborhood!

IYUxlh0GrhqP712bsYvLow.text: This is STILL the place to be!!  Came this morning around noon and what I love most is that it is consistently busy but not packed in any way.  I wish Yelp would make 10 stars available and I would give it an 11.  Got vegan tacos for myself along with sharing a breakfast platter and the garlic fries with my wife and the food is so amazing.  Chef came out a couple of times to talk to the customers and when I told him we need to keep this place hidden,  he said it is why he does not advertise which goes against every single rule in the book you can find!  We are on the email list for his special nights when he serves bolognese(I won't say the surprise but you will love it) sauce and looking forward to that!!

Zim1yLkjbjs5rK_-Db9l8A.text: The food is SO, SO good. Try the breakfast burger. You won't regret it. This is how much I loved the food: I was visiting all the way from California and I'd been looking forward to going back here. The day that I went, they were closed because they were in San Francisco for some kind of event, hahaha! We traded places and I had to settle for a different, not-as-good-as-Zenaida's restaurant that day. My "NOOOOOOOOOOOO" when I saw the Closed sign could probably be heard from miles around.

I'm a vegan and I found that their Asian-inspired tofu scramble was one of the best I've had! It had so much flavor and so filling. I also had their garlic fries (minus the parmesan) and they had enough to feed a family! Portion sizes we're definitely very satisfying and I had enough for breakfast the next day. I will definitely me visiting again!

mPDNaMGDfs7JMGAg2ZoyCA.text: WOW - that's the first thing I would like to say about this place. The service - fantastic. the food- great! Everyone here was SO nice - they treated you just like family. We went in on our way out of town from Vegas - this place is off the strip, not packed at all and very quaint. I was first very impressed- the chef of the restaurant was the one doing most of the serving to the customers. He also brought out a rose for the mom we were with since it was mothers day, so sweet! And at the end of the meal, they brought us out cookies for dessert, free of charge! So sweet- would definitely frequent here if I lived in town!

3Z1t6RP57JOFEtb05gA2vQ.text: We came here based on the Yelp reviews and photos. The interior is cute and clean. We were promptly seated. We took a few minutes to order and were hungry, so we ordered avo toast to hold us over while we decide. A few seconds later a server bring out chips to munch on and so I asked to cancel the toast..I mean it was just something to munch out while we looked..She looked annoyed, but canceled. I ordered Monte Christo and my daughter the chicken and waffles. The monte christo tasted good with the flavors blending well and the potatoes were crispy and yummy. My daughter loved the waffles, but she said the chicken was a little rubbery. I was going to give a 4 rating, but then we were given free cookies as 'compliments from the chef'. I've obviously read reviews about these and when given, it was very obvious the plate had three cookies , but one was removed...I felt grossed out by that..was it an old plate? Was it from someone else's table that only ate one?? Other Yelp photos that showed two cookies you could tell was played for two cookies. This one was played as three and one was gone. Yuck.

After the meal was delivered, the chef came out and asked us how everything tasted. I haven't had that happen in years. -FjgWBzuaoWgHXeMoULm4A.text: Wow is all I can say. I finally was able to check this place out, something I've been meaning to do ever since my coworker recommended it to me.  From the outside it looks fairly unassuming, but don't let that fool you. This place is legit.   I wish I had taken more pictures; I absolutely love the decor. It's very homey, and the rainbow checkered floor makes me so happy. There's also jazz music playing in the background. You feel quite relaxed here.  We were greeted as soon as we walked in, and seated promptly. The service was amazing, as the staff frequently checked in with us. The chef also walked around the room and chatted with customers. I love that personal touch.  I ordered the Trio Salad, which was essentially three types of salad - egg salad, tuna salad, and lobster salad. It normally comes with grapes, but they were out and the chef personally came to ask me if I would like watermelon and strawberries. I said yes, and was very pleased as they were extremely juicy and sweet.  Before we got our check, we received chocolate chip cookies with caramel drizzle, compliments of the chef. That was a very nice touch and greatly appreciated.   From looking at their menu, it looks like it's also a great spot for breakfast and brunch. I will definitely be back!

I seriously can not say enough good things about this amazing place!

cK8jPiC3SGMYQYIFtLQbqw.text: Creative menu. Wonderful staff. Homemade potato chips on the weekend. Free cookies for dessert. Simply superb salads and sandwiches. Very comfortable. No one rushes you. They handle groups and children just fine. I only wish they were open later.

pOjMt9uy-86Qu09MWM4KKg.text: Amazing food!   I had the breakfast burrito, the salsa was a great temperature and tasty. My husband had their eggs Benedict. My sister had their pancakes, thin but so fluffy served with thick slices of bacon.   The top dish that I LOVED is the corned beef hash with eggs over eggs, covered with hollandaise sauce   This was the best homemade dish I tasted the entire time in Vegas. We got homemade chocolate chip cookies drizzled with caramel and served with whipped cream. That just complimented the meal so perfectly.   The staff was great, very pleasant. We got the pleasure to meet the owner, Sterling. He was also the chef. We found out he caters for Southwest Airlines and he was dated voted ebony magazines top 15 black chefs in America. That sure as heck made a lot of sense after our meal. I hope you will give this restaurant a try. You won't be let down.   Thank you Sterling and Zenaida. We will definitely be back! Aloha

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My Ohana testing out Zenaida&#39;s. This place definitely lived up to the five star rating
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chef Sterling. Great talking with you. God bless

NVFYzSRaGyjcJlkScnwEww.text: This place is the bomb as in fantastic!!!!  The owners take pride in everything they do and the chef/owner comes out of the kitchen when not busy and greets each table.  Who does that??!!!  Special food and special God blesses humans.  Chips came to the table with a delicious aoli sauce.  Best chips and sauce ever!!!  The clam chowder is best I've had; the eggs Benedict yummy; pancakes terrific ... everything   This was my second visit... if I lived in Vegas I'd go often, but for now it's a twice a year stop.  Thank you guys for taking pride in your cooking and hospitality.  You are the gem of this place!!!!  You make it worth the trip and delicious in every way

PFwt2CVARwY9hi3pDSGRkg.text: This place has a lovely, cozy mom-and-pop feel. It's ambient with soft music, with a classic diner window and it's adorable! Try the breakfast burrito & the waffle. I don't know what they put in the food, but it's SO DELICIOUS. The service is great, staff is very friendly. Will definitely frequent

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vAIGQKGSJW7eWMzUEGZ-yQ.text: Amazing discovery thanks to Yelp recommendations. I hope they can keep the good service and outstanding food quality. The Collins hamburger was spectacular. Homemade, thick, cooked to perfection, onions, fried egg on a perfect piece of bread. You may have to drive a few minutes off the strip, but it is worth it. The only "minus" was that the coffee was not hot enough for me (I like it "boiling" hot ;-)

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JqDChtR15psntt6Zk8CYZA.text: This is one of my favorite spots to eat at when I come to Vegas, the food here is delicious. You got to try the waffles here. Yummy!

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The waffel here was so delicious, great food!

_cUcMCkj_PapCU4tIOt4CQ.text: Wow! What a wonderful find, thanks Yelp.  In town visiting family, searched for a breakfast place and hit the jackpot with Zenaida's.   Nice, strong coffee. Great start.   When I couldn't decide between two dishes, Eric did a nice job helping me to choose. Awesome food! We both totally enjoyed both meals.  Hubby ordered the Collins Breakfast Burger. So yummy!. He described it as one of the best breakfasts he has had in a long time. Delicious homemade burger. Everything about the burger was just so good. Carmelized onions, medium burger, over easy eggs all done right.  I went with the Sausage Monte Cristo. While I'd argue it wasn't really a Monte Cristo as it wasn't deep fried, it was delicious. The spicy house chicken sausage had a kick to it and the ham was so tasty. Served on a toasted baguette, this was a really nice breakfast sandwich.   Overall, a great experience and highly recommend to all my Vegas friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside the Collins Breakfast Burger
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage Monte Cristo
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Collins Breakfast Burger.

gQyI58N2aBeSR4Dzdu2XTA.text: This place is so amazing! Can't believe there isn't a line out the door. The food is ridiculously good. The hospitality is so warm & familiar. I feel like I'm visiting a friend's house that happens to feed me delicious food. :) The avocado toast is my favorite!

sD1Xc8mkUS9-uDsBWS0KlA.text: This cafe deserves 6 stars - their personal attention was amazing. When have you had the manager and the chef come visit your table at a cafe? It's not like they were doing damage control either - because it was all good, and some was great. When you have a couple people at our table (6 of us) say their dish was the best they ever had - again, at a cafe! The prices were as you'd expect - fair, and the quality was outstanding.  Do yourself a favor and take some friends here - we are doing just that next month and every time we're back in town. Enjoy it!!

iZZZJIo7GKDDdUZKygMQTA.text: What a pleasant experience I had with my wife when we dined at Zenaida's. The food was outstandingly delicious, and the staff was extremely friendly. Chef Sterling came to say hello.  Jamie introduced us to the dip he concocted for the unusually wholesome tasting home-made potato chips, Server Stephanie anticipated our needs without our asking. The atmosphere is family oriented, unlike the flashy casino restaurants. I'm certainly glad that we have a family style place to dine in Las Vegas. I live in Henderson but will be most willing to drive 15+ miles to revisit Zenaida's. May God bless these people who were so kind to us.

hrV_UlZn0fIL5dQ40unWDw.text: The food is good but I had my boyfriend's aunt say the eggs weren't cooked as she wanted them. Overall she ate them and we all enjoyed our outing for brunch. The place is cozy and small with good music with a touch of plant life. I enjoyed this place for their fast service and we got free fresh baked cookies from the chief (that was very nice of him). Plus, the coffee was good too. I highly recommend this place for a small outing with family and friends to eat a good meal for breakfast, lunch, and perhaps dinner too.

dJCl5FBkCikUkLtheWJv7g.text: Good people. Great customer service.  The chef (and maybe owner) even came out and greeted everyone.  Great food, reasonably priced and with free desert.  We are a fan.  We'll be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. free desert after our meal

FV2XWoiQ8INSqUwVfTnbRg.text: Perfect little place for an awesome breakfest. The staff is very friendly and the chef even wished us a great day. Will be back again!!

JCf0uYzG4DAe1QgywTXosw.text: yes! good food. exceptional service. Thank you Chef Sterling!   This review is overdue, but I had to make sure to write one. We had a large party come in and I got a call back right away to confirm our reservation. It was clear to me that they wanted to be sure they would be able to accommodate our party as well as their other regulars comfortably. I really appreciated this attention to detail.   I love that this restaurant is located away from the strip and crowds with ample free parking in the strip mall.   Everyone in our party was happy with their dishes. I loved the thick bacon slices in my eggs benny. It's not what I would consider as healthy food, but real food prepared well.   I would definitely come back and recommend to others.

tD10BcvAI2iw0duLJfRkuA.text: My husband and I went to this resturant and had an amazing time. The food was delicious and the host was helpful and informative. We ordered the avocado toast and it was delicious! Sidenote* my husband doesn't eat tomatoes but he loved it on the avocado toast! My husband ordered their tri tip special and i ordered the eggs benedict and they were both amazing! The chef was kind and came out after we ate to make sure we liked the food. Will definitely comeback again!

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Compliments of the chef cookies and cream!
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs benedict..so good!
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tri tip special declious!

v9eQEJ1KG-p0-n7zrX5W0Q.text: I wasn't expecting much when we walked in but so glad we did. The stuffed French toast was AMAZING! Best meal I've had in Las Vegas.

LDixG9Fe-zuUhjYBTTPb_g.text: Food was absolutely fantastic with large portions. Got a free freshly baked cookie at the end of brunch. It's about a 20 minute ride from the strip.

IodZ3dyMtAUpZ6zgUb6IuQ.text: First time here, very close to the house So it was I nice brisk walk for me and my wife. Seems they have only been around about a year or so, Atmosphere is very casual and very open area. The wait was about 10 or 15 minutes, we were attended to right away and had our drink orders taken. No shortage of attention given here we had the brunch special of an open face crab meat and spinach omelette and home made seasoned potatoes with tomato bisque soup and choice of fruit plate or cheese cake for desert, chose the fruit plate. We shared the meal and the portions are very healthy. Service was excellent. The Chef came out to check and greet on the customers too  I recommend this place for sure and we will be back again for sure  Luis V, Las Vegas Nv

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Main brunch dish, open face crab meat omelette. Very tasty
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brunch special starter, tomato bisque

aCLkuIqxSVHTdNnhoxR7xw.text: This was a great brunch find! We got off a 5 hour flight... was in search for food and found this cute cafe.  I ordered the homemade corn beef hash and eggs that came with yummy hollandaise sauce, which made it totally amazing! Chef added a special touch with some warm homemade cookies... made us feel real special.   Food was fresh, tasty, and served hot.  Restaurant was super cute and colorful.  Service was timely and friendly.  Would definitely go back again on this trip.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Homemade corn beef hash

4MjKDMyIcAdTiEtfFXbtQg.text: Excellent choice for breakfast!!! We had the Avocado Toast, Corned Beef Hash, Kiona Pancake Stack! So much food we couldn't finish, the pancakes were massive and so delicious. Corned Beef Hash was some of the best I've had....and the Avocado Toast was worth the trip across town! Fresh made chips with aioli to start on the table, and delicious cookies to finish our meal! Highly suggest you stop in Zenaida's if your in Vegas!!!!

NmOj7Vb-ZVrLaja0olcRMg.text: My guy took me here for brunch yesterday and we really enjoyed our food!  Tastefully decorated  & comfortable booths.  We had a cheeseburger deluxe & it was a huge burger. We especially liked the dessert homemade chocolate cup cookies topped with fresh made whipped cram everyone was so friendly and made us feel right at home!

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EAigU7QtBPsB98F8IJY4XQ.text: Great food. Wonderful service. Clearly a commitment to excellence  Both the chef and waiter insured all was great with our  meal. Go you won't be disappointed

vR-mG2iYlsOWI0U1tmg29A.text: The 5-star reviews do not lie. I was worried when I walked in and the place was empty, but the staff was welcoming so I decided to stay. The food is legit. I had the special short rib hash with soft scrambled eggs. It was incredible. Then the chef (and this place has a real chef) sent out a complimentary dessert. I was too stuffed to eat much if it, but it was very good.   I recommend trying this place soon. Word is going to get out and I predict when I return to Las Vegas in a few months I might have to wait for a table here. They have only been open 6 months but word will spread and this will be become a hot spot. Get there and enjoy before the crowds do.

KZKHy16Q_-plYAwTKcB2RA.text: A total hidden gem!! Great food and great service. I come here for breakfast all the time and have never been disappointedly Camryn one of the servers is my favorite and always has a smile on her face. 10/10 recommend!

yLcON52R0uOfJ2yYtb0mHQ.text: Monte Cristo is phenomenal. Service excellent, great experience! A great place to come for an enjoyable morning breakfast.

n8SLxQRYEgz4ip0m4Auhcg.text: Fair prices and amazing food.  I had the grilled asparagus and bourchin open faced omelette and also had a oatmeal caramel cream cookie compliments of the chef.  Great service as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

wV13xFjaPktRVBKTjuobSg.text: Amazing, the best mac and cheese I have ever had. I can't wait to go back to Vegas to get more mac and cheese and try more items on the menu. The avocado toast was also to die for. The owners are personable, and provide awesome service. This place is a little gem, map it out and treat yourself. Cindy

VRyd1xoJg4NuplXrhL3nNw.text: I saw this restaurant listed on YELP with really high reviews and decided to check it out (we were visiting from San Diego) This place is absolutely delicious. The Avocado toast was the BEST I have ever had (and I'm from California!). I will dream about this toast until I can get here again. I had the breakfast burger and again this was absolutely delicious. The service was excellent and the "on the house" free cookies were yumeee. Highly highly recommend this restaurant for food, best meal our whole Vegas trip hands down

ZddIT2NT6mMGZnf8CbzFnQ.text: I am honestly surprised that this establishment has a five star rating on Yelp. The service was really slow even when there was hardly anyone in the restaurant, and the waiter gave us some attitude. I am just glad that the food I got, a breakfast burrito, was really good. However , the food that my friends ordered was subpar. The coffee is also so weak that it tastes like water. It's supposedly dark roast Colombian! I think the quality of the coffee really determines how good a restaurant is.

DmIu1kfX5qztSRvWIl4YhA.text: Excellent customer service and delicious food!  I love the hearty dishes, with vegan options. We'll definitely be back!

b_-yXa1FoJakOkIwyty7kA.text: Absolutely loved this place! Visited because it's on our side of town and the other reviews. The biscuits and gravy were huge and delicious. My boyfriend ordered corned beef hash, we suspect the corned beef was not homemade bit I'm still giving 5 stars because the experience as a whole was great. They play jazz and the place has a very laid back atmosphere. The chef also sent us over some complimentary desert at the end and it was delicious.  We can't wait to go back!

KYta7hQK9pHyVlt1OdJ1rw.text: The food was great and the service was friendly. When traveling with a big family it's hard to find a quality place to have breakfast. Everyone found something that they would want to eat and it was prepared just right. I would go here again the next time I'm in town.

5bFzywUZ9tr9ZIP-Nwdlpg.text: Great food and service. Excellent vegetarian options. Must try if you have time to get off the strip.

nFhBe3fo49w1BhPGdQyykQ.text: Delicious!!! Such a cute Cafe! Amazing food and staff! Highly impressed and plan to be back again!

nmgLtv6j9xqr_0pmRDz1Vw.text: Cute little restaurant that is family owned. The food was super delicious, zero complaints about it. The only issue we had about the service is that it was a bit slow since there was only one waiter working on the day we went. I'm not sure if that's the norm for them. Either way it wasn't enough for me to take a star away since he was super friendly when we needed him at our table.

enKQvZ0x-mAc6AUWHAThpA.text: Excellent service! Not only was the food delicious and creative, but highly affordable. Though it appears unassuming, I highly suggest checking this place out.

p07SMZAmXSbmUscFL_Bt3Q.text: Great little breakfast spot, off the beaten-path.   Wonderful food, nice presentation.     Inventive and tasty meals.  The avocado toast doesn't disappoint.  Inexpensive, unassuming.   Great service. Definitely  Recommend highly.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VyVwL2T-gsZBIGOT5Tb3Dw.text: Good fresh quality food. The chef would not allow the plates to just sit waiting for waiter/waitress to pickup he would call them to pickup quickly. I would just recommend to add at least 2 more shelves such as where the green vases so that when people walk in they don't have to stare at the folks eating already and vise versa; as well as, the folks eating don't have to stare at the cashier's and their transactions. Otherwise food and service was great!!

r48cuevuEAKkTkE7pJZcmA.text: Decided to try this place after seeing the reviews on yelp. The first person that greeted us was a young girl who was very sweet but, not very attentive.They brought out house made chips First with a bloody Mary aoli. The chips were delicious and crisp and the aoli was very unique and yummy.  We then ordered the zucchini with the garlic aoli which was very tasty. The zucchini was crunchy and fresh which complimented the crispy planko crust well.The garlic aoli on the other hand tasted like plain mayo. I order the Mac and cheese with sausage and my girlfriend ordered corn beef and hash. My Mac and cheese was swimming in grease and cream and was very poorly proportioned. It was a huge bowl of Mac and cheese with 4 little sausages on top. And it did not have good flavor at all. My girlfriends corn beef and hash was delicious. The eggs were poached perfectly but, it was a large quantity. It was enough for 2 people. The customer service was not very great. The two people on the floor walked past us several times without asking us if we needed anything even tho we were clearly just sitting there waiting. There was an older lady that was not friendly and when my girlfriend smiled at her she gave her a dirty look. They gave us complementary cookies which were tasty but, the presentation was messy. Overall this place had a good start and good end but, just got a little messy in the middle.

Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mac and cheese with sausage
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Zucchini and garlic aoli

O-xWLgPLMN6JSucM9xtF5A.text: Zenaida's is amazing! I love coming here for the Eggs Benedict. The staff is extremely attentive. The food is fresh and coffee is to die for. I've definitely recommended this place to all my family and friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RGObF3xE2Xrr0fgb619ZEg.text: Great hidden gem.  Food was prepared with attention to detail.  Avacado toast was perfectly balanced with balsamic vinegar, pickled red onion, heirloom tomatoes and a generous portion of ripe avacado.   BBQ pork sandwich served with spicy slaw was  delicious.   Our server was friendly and prompt.  Highly recommend

JfXrYr3Eqi5gU03_8Q8mKg.text: Let's talk YUMMY! I found Zenaida's by pure chance and my tummy is ecstatic I did.  Upon entry, I was seated immediately. The well rounded menu was on my placemat and the daily specials were described in detail. My server, possibly the owner(?), was friendly and forthcoming when asked specific questions about ingredients.  Ultimately, homemade hollandaise sauce drove me to pick the Benedict. In addition, I ordered homemade grits sans the cheese-I like mine sweet.  While awaiting my meal I was served homemade chips - a weekend special- with bloody mary aioli. They were so very delicious I took my leftovers home.  The Benedict came with thick slab bacon, perfectly poached eggs, a thin English muffin, and a wonderfully prepared homemade sauce- and potatoes (which, in my opinion, were overkill because I was to full to eat them). The grits were better than mama's!  Chef Sterling holds a tight reign on his kitchen, calling out timings to his young cooks. Towards the end of my meal the Chef visited all of the tables and chatted diners up. It was all very personable.   I will be back!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Zenaida's Cafe - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yEPfQa-VAsJPSxs7rHjM9w.text: Just don't expect to have a slab of bacon on your eggs Benedict all I got was a thin slice of Canadian Bacon. I did like the hollandaise sauce and my husband liked his huge pancakes and the tater tots. I would have preferred breakfast potatoes. They don't tell you of the changes to their menu. You also have to ask for coffee refills. Don't expect equal treatment between tables some get offered a refill others right next do not. Some get service others don't. Some get special treatment and others don't.
